sha256Encrypt

public static java.lang.String sha256Encrypt(java.lang.String base)
Encrypt the given base with the SHA-256 encryption algorithm. Return the result as a string

Parameters:
base - Value to encrypt.
Returns:
Encrypted value.

getCurrentTimeFormatted

public static java.lang.String getCurrentTimeFormatted()
Convenience method to get the current time as a string formatted as yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'.

Returns:
The current time formatted as yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'; RFC3339 format

displayMessage

public static void displayMessage(java.lang.String action,
                                  java.lang.String key,
                                  android.content.Context context,
                                  java.lang.String message)
Notifies UI to display a message.

This method is defined in the common helper because it's used both by the UI and the background service.

Parameters:
context - application's context.
message - message to be displayed.

getSharedPreferences

public static android.content.SharedPreferences getSharedPreferences(android.content.Context context,
                                                                     java.lang.String name)
Get the SharedPreferences with a given context and name. Getting the preferences here will ensure that the object is process safe on gingerbread devices and above (>10). This is legacy (but undocumented) behavior in pre gingerbread devices.

Parameters:
context - the application context
name - Desired preferences file. If a preferences file by this name does not exist, it will be created when you retrieve an editor (SharedPreferences.edit()) and then commit changes (Editor.commit()).
Returns:
SharedPreferences that is process safe
